about.title: MSADDI.EST - Metal Fabrication Syria
about.subtitle: Premier Sheet Metal Fabrication & Laser Cutting Services
about.description: MSADDI.EST specializes in industrial metal fabrication, offering laser cutting services for stainless steel, aluminum, copper, and brass. Our 6000x2500mm laser cutting capabilities and 135T CNC bending machines deliver precision metal parts for construction, automotive, and manufacturing industries across Aleppo and Syria.
